title: Get out of elo hell.
body:
Hello i am a b4 player on euw and i'm stuck in bronze want someone come out of bronze mabye we can duo carry.  
My lol name is Captbigmo 
Main toplaner and good jungler.

replies.body: There is no out, every elo is elo hell.

> [{quoted}](name=whitePumah,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=tduqAAYu,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-02T07:28:33.444+0000)
>
> There is no out, every elo is elo hell.

:OOOOOOO its pumah oml the meme machine himself

Dont listen to this guy hes just hardstuck whatever rank he is now after thousands of games. If you read his posts u can tell he's just a deluded wacko who seems to think the game should revolve around his off-meta playstyle with Twitch and everyone on the team should follow his commands quite literally to a tee. Completely insane

> [{quoted}](name=LetsTwitch,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=tduqAAYu,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-06-08T06:14:26.189+0000)
> Dont listen to this guy hes just hardstuck whatever rank he is now after thousands of games.

Honestly should I even reply to this? He already contradicted himself making the statement invalid.

jst sayin.
This is OCE boards.
You'll want to be on the EUW boards.
Just a heads up.

> [{quoted}](name=Unfriending,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=tduqAAYu,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-06-01T06:00:31.381+0000)
>
> whats ur elo xD

Silver 4 - http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/175302463/200847413?tab=overview
My elo is pre ez doe

ijs, bronze has more skill than silver here. 
Just uhh, just fair warning.
